content:
<rule id="embedded-cache-libraries-15000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-boot-starter-cache" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-cache" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Spring Boot Cache library">
                    <description>
                        The application embeds the Spring Boot Cache library.
                    </description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Boot Cache</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
